basics.name: Jonathan Nguyen
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

jobs.name: IT Assistants
summaries: Maintain, install, update Computer Lab desktops and laptops
Configuring and maintaining network security such as firewall, security patching
Support computer services for Professors and Falcuties

work.company: Sullivan Family of Companies, Honolulu HI

jobs.name: Service Desk Specialist
summaries: Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues with store employees over the phone or by email.
Handling ticket system to keep our team updated with contemporary issues.
Replace and repair equipment inside our stores.

jobs.name: IT Ops Specialist
summaries: Monitor, report, and run MSSQL cycles on demand.
Monitor and maintenance Azure VMs including firewall(whitelist) and windows patching.
Write PowerShell/Bat scripts to automate repetitive tasks (E.g. run multiple cycles, monitor websites).
Using RMM software to monitor and report issues on VMs.

jobs.name: Software Engineer
summaries: Translate a software that generate project template from Perl to C# code.
Support Monthly/Quarterly SQL Reports and fix any issue that may come up

jobs.name: Software Developer
summaries: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: I created a SumoBot that won the 1st place during a summer engineering course in HCC.  See my portfolio site for more details.
